text:
Pennsylvania’s minimum wage has been $7.25 since 2009.

Not only do all of our neighboring states have a higher minimum wage, but they’ve all raised it numerous times.

It’s time for Pennsylvania to do the same. #RaiseTheWagepic.twitter.com/wsxCshzNaJ

text:
(1/2) Pres. Trump isn’t hard at work #ForThePeople like me & my @HouseDemocrats colleagues b/c Donald J. Trump perfectly illustrates that he cares about himself, and himself only.
 
In his 2020 budget, @POTUS calls for a $3.5B CUT to the Women, Infants, + Children (WIC) program.

html: (2/2) A $3.5B cut to WIC would harm 400K women, pregnant women, & their children! As a former @HouseAgDems member, I worked hard to protect SNAP b/c it's a lifeline for low-income families & the same goes for WIC. DIAL 202-224-3121 and URGE your Representative to protect WIC!

html: (1/2) Today's #EqualPayDay + women of color are STILL grossly underpaid compared to their *white* male counterparts. In 2019, the women in my family & the women of color in PHL are tired of putting the same amount of work & dedication into their job – only to be paid less!
text:
(1/2) Today's #EqualPayDay + women of color are STILL grossly underpaid compared to their *white* male counterparts.

In 2019, the women in my family & the women of color in PHL are tired of putting the same amount of work & dedication into their job – only to be paid less!

html: (2/2) Although there's a hashtag to signify its importance, as a nation, we need to talk about equal pay more than a day. It needs to become part of our everyday conversation so we can dismantle the stigma involved discussing income inequality!
text:
(2/2) Although there's a hashtag to signify its importance, as a nation, we need to talk about equal pay more than a day.

It needs to become part of our everyday conversation so we can dismantle the stigma involved discussing income inequality!

html: While I never heard of Nipsey Hussle until yesterday, after watching some of his interviews I could tell he was passionate about lifting the South Central LA community out of poverty. That's why his death hurts so many people in our community -- he was using his power for good.
text:
While I never heard of Nipsey Hussle until yesterday, after watching some of his interviews I could tell he was passionate about lifting the South Central LA community out of poverty.
 
That's why his death hurts so many people in our community -- he was using his power for good.

html: As a PROUD PHL'ian, born & raised, and a MoC who represents a city that has a 26% poverty rate where folks work 40+ hrs/wk to feed their kids, pay the bills, & carefully watch street corners so they don't become a gun violence statistic -- this tweet is incredibly powerful to me!https://twitter.com/JamiraBurley/status/1112532046340124674 …

html: While the need for affordable healthcare is a MUST, the need for fresh, healthy, affordable food in PHL is critical, too! In the 115th Congress, when I served on @HouseAgDems, I worked alongside my colleagues to include a $25M Produce Prescription Program in the 18’ Farm Bill.>>
text:
While the need for affordable healthcare is a MUST, the need for fresh, healthy, affordable food in PHL is critical, too!

In the 115th Congress, when I served on @HouseAgDems, I worked alongside my colleagues to include a $25M Produce Prescription Program in the 18’ Farm Bill.>>

html: In light of the very concerning discrepancies and final decision making at the Justice Department following the Special Counsel report, where Mueller did not exonerate the President, we will be calling Attorney General Barr in to testify before @HouseJudiciary in the near future.
text: In light of the very concerning discrepancies and final decision making at the Justice Department following the Special Counsel report, where Mueller did not exonerate the President, we will be calling Attorney General Barr in to testify before @HouseJudiciary in the near future.

html: There must be full transparency in what Special Counsel Mueller uncovered to not exonerate the President from wrongdoing. DOJ owes the public more than just a brief synopsis and decision not to go any further in their work.
text: There must be full transparency in what Special Counsel Mueller uncovered to not exonerate the President from wrongdoing. DOJ owes the public more than just a brief synopsis and decision not to go any further in their work.

html: But Special Counsel Mueller clearly and explicitly is not exonerating the President, and we must hear from AG Barr about his decision making and see all the underlying evidence for the American people to know all the facts.
text: But Special Counsel Mueller clearly and explicitly is not exonerating the President, and we must hear from AG Barr about his decision making and see all the underlying evidence for the American people to know all the facts.

html: Because of the #ACA, insurers in the individual market can no longer drop or deny coverage, or charge you more, because of a pre-existing condition #ACAanniversary
text: Because of the #ACA, insurers in the individual market can no longer drop or deny coverage, or charge you more, because of a pre-existing condition #ACAanniversary

html: Insurers are now required to cover important health benefits like maternity care. Before the ACA, 75 percent of non-group plans refused to cover maternity care. #ACAanniversary
text: Insurers are now required to cover important health benefits like maternity care. Before the ACA, 75 percent of non-group plans refused to cover maternity care. #ACAanniversary

html: Did you know that because of the #ACA, insurers can no longer charge women more than men for the same care? #ProtectOurCare #ACAanniversary

The truth is, low-income parents, continue to do this b/c the deck is stacked against them -- that's why I'm fighting for educational equity.https://twitter.com/RepDwightEvans/status/1107393383318913024 …
text:
BTW: I have no shame in saying my mom was 1 of those parents who used a diff home address to ensure I would go to a great PHL school.
 
The truth is, low-income parents, continue to do this b/c the deck is stacked against them -- that's why I'm fighting for educational equity.https://twitter.com/RepDwightEvans/status/1107393383318913024 …

html: While the rich & famous are paying an “easy” $500,000 to get their children into prestigious schools, many PHL’ians are struggling to stay afloat as they ensure their kids are receiving the best possible care. In Congress, I’m doing everything I can to level the playing field.
text:
While the rich & famous are paying an “easy” $500,000 to get their children into prestigious schools, many PHL’ians are struggling to stay afloat as they ensure their kids are receiving the best possible care.

In Congress, I’m doing everything I can to level the playing field.

html: In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed. It's past time for thoughts and prayers. We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV
text:
In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed.
 
It's past time for thoughts and prayers.
 
We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV

html: (2 of 2) What I’ve done during the #TrumpShutdown: - Went to airport 2X to meet with workers - Helped unload food donations for affected workers - Voted 10X for funding bills to REOPEN YOUR GOVERNMENT & PAY THE WORKERS NOW!
text:
(2 of 2) What I’ve done during the #TrumpShutdown:

- Went to airport 2X to meet with workers

- Helped unload food donations for affected workers

- Voted 10X for funding bills to REOPEN YOUR GOVERNMENT & PAY THE WORKERS NOW!

html: Since someone asked, here’s what I’ve done during the #TrumpShutdown: - NOT taking my pay during shutdown - Spoke at workers’ rally @ Independence Hall - Participated in union rally & march in DC - Spoke with SEPTA & now TSA workers have free transportation to & from work 1/2
text:
Since someone asked, here’s what I’ve done during the #TrumpShutdown:

- NOT taking my pay during shutdown

- Spoke at workers’ rally @ Independence Hall

- Participated in union rally & march in DC

- Spoke with SEPTA & now TSA workers have free transportation to & from work
1/2

html: (3/4) A letter that does nothing to ease their pain + provide them w/ some type of relief that this shutdown will end. ICYMI: 800K federal workers & contractors are in desperate need of help. They can't afford to have politicians dismiss their suffering w/ a letter like this!
text:
(3/4) A letter that does nothing to ease their pain + provide them w/ some type of relief that this shutdown will end.

ICYMI: 800K federal workers & contractors are in desperate need of help.

They can't afford to have politicians dismiss their suffering w/ a letter like this!

html: (4/4) @SenToomey, Instead of sending this letter to my constituents, why don't you work with me and my Democratic colleagues to re-open the government and #EndTheShutdown. The American people can’t afford to miss another paycheck! Sincerely, Dwight
text:
(4/4)

@SenToomey,

Instead of sending this letter to my constituents, why don't you work with me and my Democratic colleagues to re-open the government and #EndTheShutdown.

The American people can’t afford to miss another paycheck!

Sincerely,

Dwight

html: #WheresMitch and the Senate Republicans? @SenToomey will you help??? Asking on behalf of the 800,000 federal workers — especially the nearly 13,000 federal workers in Pennsylvania — who are in desperate need of their paychecks to provide for their loved ones. #EndTheShutdown
text:
#WheresMitch and the Senate Republicans?

@SenToomey will you help???

Asking on behalf of the 800,000 federal workers — especially the nearly 13,000 federal workers in Pennsylvania — who are in desperate need of their paychecks to provide for their loved ones.

#EndTheShutdown

html: Many federal workers are the sole breadwinner in their family. Taking a household's one and only paycheck is cruel. Full stop. What President Trump and the GOP are doing sheds light on what’s truly important to them – dividing our country and pandering to their shrinking base.

Many federal workers are the sole breadwinner in their family. Taking a household's one and only paycheck is cruel.
 
Full stop.

What President Trump and the GOP are doing sheds light on what’s truly important to them – dividing our country and pandering to their shrinking base.

html: THREAD: The #GovernmentShutdown is incredibly hard for many Philadelphians! I’ve received a #ShutdownStory from one woman who wrote the following: I work for the IRS and some of us work paycheck-to-paycheck. Bill collectors don’t want to hear they can’t get their money....(1/3)
text:
THREAD: The #GovernmentShutdown is incredibly hard for many Philadelphians!

I’ve received a #ShutdownStory from one woman who wrote the following:

I work for the IRS and some of us work paycheck-to-paycheck. Bill collectors don’t want to hear they can’t get their money....(1/3)
